name: Gilbert Green and the Curse of Halloween
name_original: Gilbert Green and the Curse of Halloween
description:
Made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019

Help Gilbert run along triangular platforms and collect as much candy as possible. Look out for those gaps.  The platforms and trees after the starting two platforms are randomly generated.


Theme

Cursemas Eve

Achievements

  • Iron Triangle - Your game primarily uses triangles for its art.
  • Gameboy - Your game only uses 8-bit soundfx and is in the classic gameboy 4-color green palette.
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1
